shadow.name: STRESS
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Keeping Still, expressing through stress

gift.name: RESTRAINT
gift.description: The gift frequency of Keeping Still, expressing through restraint

siddhi.name: STILLNESS
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Keeping Still, expressing through stillness

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 52 shadow frequency. The stress you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural restraint. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from stress to restraint.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your root. Notice the sensation of stress.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 52 consciously for 7 days, the stress pattern will shift toward restraint.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 52 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from stress toward restraint
